name: ListSpans
description:
Fetch spans based on a search query with pagination.

This tool retrieves spans from Datadog that match a specified search query. Use it to filter and search spans for analysis or monitoring. Note that the endpoint supports paginated results and is subject to rate limits of 300 requests per hour.

parameters.name: minimum_time_filter
parameters.description: The minimum time for the requested spans. Supports ISO8601, date math, and timestamps (milliseconds).

value_schema.description: The minimum time for the requested spans, supports date-time ISO8601, date math, and regular timestamps (milliseconds).

parameters.name: span_search_query
parameters.description: The search query string following the span search syntax to filter spans.

value_schema.description: The search query - following the span search syntax.

parameters.name: end_time_filter
parameters.description: The maximum time for requested spans. Supports ISO8601, date math, or timestamps in milliseconds.

value_schema.description: The maximum time for the requested spans, supports date-time ISO8601, date math, and regular timestamps (milliseconds).

parameters.name: time_offset_seconds
parameters.description: The time offset in seconds to apply to the query for adjusting the time frame.

value_schema.description: The time offset (in seconds) to apply to the query.

parameters.name: timezone_option
parameters.description: Specify the timezone using GMT, UTC, an offset (e.g., UTC+1), or a Timezone Database ID (e.g., America/New_York).

value_schema.description: The timezone can be specified as GMT, UTC, an offset from UTC (like UTC+1), or as a Timezone Database identifier (like America/New_York).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string cursor to fetch the next set of results from the previous query.

value_schema.description: List following results with a cursor provided in the previous query.

parameters.name: max_number_of_spans
parameters.description: Maximum number of spans to return in the response. Integer value expected.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of spans in the response.

parameters.name: sort_order_for_spans
parameters.description: Set the sort order for querying spans. Use 'timestamp' for ascending or '-timestamp' for descending.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: The type of resource; must be set to 'search_request' for the query.

value_schema.description: The type of resource. The value should always be search_request.
